properties.entry: SELECT CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY ORDER BY 1

SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NAME, COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON(BOARD_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, CATEGORY_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, 1, ?, ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON(B.BOARD_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET CATEGORY_NO = ?, BOARD_TITLE = ?, BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
